[PatentsView](https://patentsview.org/what-is-patentsview) provides insights about patents. 

The data can be accessed either with either:

- their [elastic search API](https://search.patentsview.org/docs/docs/Search%20API/SearchAPIReference/) and an R wrapper around it ([patentsview](https://docs.ropensci.org/patentsview/))

- or by [bulk download](https://patentsview.org/download/data-download-tables)
